item.title: G’athre
item.description: G’athre are small poisonous amphibians of the equatorial rainforest of the 2nd realm. Morphology They are tetrapodal, exhibit fortuitary glands, and have 4 “nostrils” on each side of their spine, totalling 8.

item.title: Neth River Civilisation
item.description: The Neth River Civilisation existed in 7,000 YA. Location The Neth River Civilisation was located along the Neth River, which flowed from the Nessaui lake into the Sarvaran Gulf.

item.title: Proto-Neth
item.description: Proto-Neth was spoken in 7,000YA by the Neth Minikin. Grammar Word Order Proto-Neth word order was generally free, but the verb almost always stayed in between the subject and object.

item.title: Sayä
item.description: Sayä is a plant of the equatorial rainforest of the 2nd-realm which features small pink flowers. Predators The Flowers are sought after by Minikin, Demislugs, and small rodents due to their high concentration of nutrients.
